// client/src/About.js import React from 'react'; function About() { return (

About PEAS

PEAS (Personalized Easy Assistant Service) is a unique platform designed to simplify the way you book museum tickets across Tamil Nadu. With a mission to promote the state's rich heritage and culture, PEAS connects travelers, students, and history lovers directly to over 50+ museums through a smart chatbot interface.

From ancient Chola temples to vibrant art galleries, Tamil Nadu’s museums offer an unforgettable journey into the past. PEAS makes accessing these treasures easy and hassle-free — no long queues, no confusing websites. Just start chatting, choose your district, pick your museum, and book your tickets instantly!

Whether you're planning a school trip, a family outing, or a solo adventure, PEAS is here to guide you every step of the way. Our chatbot ensures real-time support, quick booking, and up-to-date information — all tailored to Tamil Nadu’s finest cultural destinations.

The Government Museum, Chennai — one of the many treasures you can explore with PEAS.

); } export default About;
